nodes.text: The Japrael system, also called the Onderon system, was home to the planet Onderon along with seven other planets. It centered around the star Prael.

In Tales of the Jedi, Arca Jeth says the system is called the Onderon system after its only inhabited planet, and that it consists of three planets. The Tales of the Jedi Companion, The Essential Guide to Planets and Moons, and The Essential Atlas however, call it the Japrael system and that it consists of eight planets. It is called Onderon system again in Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords, and The New Essential Chronology.
